alert.note: Alert for Eastern Lemhi County; Western Lemhi County (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued August 20 at 12:20PM MDT until August 21 at 10:00PM MDT by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM TO 10 PM MDT MONDAY... * WHAT...South winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. The highest winds will impact areas south and east of Salmon, where frequent gusts of 40 to 50 mph are expected. * WHERE...Eastern Lemhi County and Western Lemhi County. * WHEN...From 9 AM to 10 PM MDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Lemhi County; Western Lemhi County
